mapper.select: select review_id, file_id, file_name, file_size, content_type, DATE_FORMAT(update_date, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') as file_up_date_str from tbl_file_info where review_id = #{reviewId}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_file_info (file_id, review_id, file_name, file_size, content_type, update_date) values (#{fileId}, #{reviewId}, #{fileName}, #{fileSize}, #{contentType}, UTC_TIMESTAMP())
